en_us: Strike a Purpur Block with lightning to create a Shulker
Bottle and harness the power of lightning using Brewing Stands! Lightning in a Bottle comes in splash and lingering variants, too.
Lightning can be absorbed into a thick potion when struck by lightning.\n\nPillagers, evokers, purpur, and prismarine can amplify or animate into new mobs when struck by lightning.

Pillagers can be amplified into Evokers.
Evokers can be amplified into Illusioners.

Purpur Blocks can be animated into Shulkers.
Prismarine Bricks can be animated into Guardians.

To harness lightning, place a lightning rod attached to the top or bottom of a brewing stand.\n\nWhen the rod is struck, any thick potions inside the brewing stand will be converted into bottles of lightning.
Splash and Lingering variants can be brewed as normal.\n\nWhen a bottle of lightning is drank or thrown, it will release a bolt of lightning!
